---
title: "Peanut sauce"
author: "James Edwards"
categories: [sauce]
description: "A sauce for stirfrys"
---

* 140g smooth peanut butter
* 1 clove of garlic
* 1 cm of ginger
* 1 lime (juice)
* 1 tsp tamarind soy
* 1 tsp sesame oil
* 1 tsp sunflower oil
* 1/2 tsp brown sugar
* Drop of tabasco

1. Blend/chop ginger and garlic. Mix everything except peanut butter.
1. Add peanut butter spoon at a time, adding water if needed. Seal in glass jar and shake.
1. Add roasted peanuts and coconut milk to make it into a satay sauce.
